item.description:
The Salon, so called because the prior tennant was a hair salon, is one of downtown's newest bars, reputed to have good drinks, great space for socializing, eclectic decor, eclectic music, odd food and ping pong tables.

Come down for a few drinks, play a game of Ping Pong, or challenge fellow newcomers to games on the Pin Ball machines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sure to have something identifiable (like a sign)
item.why: They have ping-pong tables and drinks, isn't that enough?
item.name: Drinks and Ping Pong @ The Salon
